async send(to_address: str, amount: int, fee: int = 0, auto_estimate_fee=False) → dict[source]

Build transaction, sign and send.

Parameters:

  • to_address – DAG address

  • amount – Amount with 8 decimals (e.g. 100000000 = 1 DAG)

  • fee – Fee with 8 deciamls (e.g. 20000 = 0.0002 DAG)

  • auto_estimate_fee
